comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message indicating that invitations have been resent again, likely found on a button or in a confirmation dialog in the room update access section of the InfoPanel.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Կրկին ուղարկված հրավերներ՝' while literally translating to 'Invitations resent:', doesn't quite convey the nuance of 'Invitations sent again:' It feels a bit clunky and formal.  A more natural phrasing might be preferred, depending on the surrounding context within the application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Վերահրավերներ՝' or 'Կրկնելով ուղարկված հրավերներ՝' for a more natural feel. The best choice will depend on the overall tone of the application.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Invitations sent again:' implies a confirmation that invitations have been resent. The Japanese translation '招待状を再度送信しました：' literally translates to 'We sent invitations again:' and while understandable, it lacks the direct confirmation implied in the English. A more accurate translation might emphasize the completion and confirmation of the resent action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 招待状を再送しました：

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Uzaicinājumi, kas ir nosūtīti vēlreiz:' is a bit literal and sounds slightly awkward in Latvian. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Uzaicinājumi atkārtoti nosūtīti:' or 'Uzaicinājumi nosūtīti atkārtoti:'.
The translation 'ආරාධනා නැවත එවුව:' is a literal translation but sounds awkward in Sinhala. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'ආරාධනා නැවත යවනු ලැබුව:' or 'ආරාධනා නැවත පంపුව:'.

The English phrase 'Invitations sent again:' implies a repetition of a previous sending action. The Serbian translation 'Позивнице поново послате:' is a literal translation of 'Invitations sent again:' and is technically correct, but it might sound slightly unnatural in Serbian. A more natural phrasing might emphasize the update or re-sending action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a phrasing like 'Позивнице поново послате' (Invitations resent) or 'Позивнице су поново послате' (Invitations have been resent again) depending on the intended nuance.
